hero.title: Creating Jerenyon Dev.
hero.subtitle: Geospatial expertise meets Generative AI: how & why I built Jerenyon Dev.

jerenyon-dev.title: The Story of Jerenyon Dev
jerenyon-dev.subtitle: Jerenyon Dev, bridge between Generative AI and Geospatial Intelligence, and more.

paragraphs.p1: Jerenyon Dev is more than just a web development and automation service, it is a platform dedicated to integrating Generative AI and Geospatial Intelligence, through automation. With a vision to simplify complex workflows, Jerenyon Dev delivers AI-driven automation and geospatial solutions that enhance decision-making and operational efficiency.
paragraphs.p2: Specializing in Generative AI and geospatial automation, Jerenyon Dev builds AI-powered tools, intelligent workflows, and scalable applications. Whether through LLM-powered document processing, AI-driven data insights, or geospatial automation, Jerenyon Dev provides tailored solutions to streamline business operations.
paragraphs.p3: Beyond providing services, Jerenyon Dev fosters knowledge-sharing. Through articles, tutorials, and project showcases, it offers hands-on insights into AI-enhanced automation, Python programming, React/Next.js development, and geospatial intelligence. By merging practical AI solutions with advanced geospatial expertise, Jerenyon Dev is at the forefront of bridging AI and geospatial innovation.
paragraphs.p4: With a commitment to continuous learning and cutting-edge research, Jerenyon Dev helps businesses harness AI for automation, enabling them to stay ahead in an AI-powered world. Whether you are looking to integrate Generative AI, automate workflows, or enhance geospatial intelligence, Jerenyon Dev is your partner for the future of AI-driven transformation.

jeremie.title: The Mind Behind Jerenyon Dev
jeremie.subtitle: Introducing Jeremie, the Founder of Jerenyon Dev

paragraphs.p1: I am a Generative AI Engineer and Full-Stack Developer specializing in AI-driven automation, scalable applications, and geospatial intelligence. My journey began with a Master in geography, evolving into expertise in programming, automation, and  AI integration. I focus on bridging AI, automation, and geospatial expertise to create efficient and innovative solutions.
paragraphs.p2: With deep experience in building intelligent, data-driven applications and leading AI R&D initiatives, I remain committed to leveraging LLMs, AI agents, and RAG workflows to enhance automation. My approach emphasizes practical applications of AI rather than developing foundational models, continuously expanding my expertise through certifications and research.
paragraphs.p3: Jerenyon Dev is my platform to merge automation, AI, and geospatial intelligence into impactful solutions for businesses. It also serves as a knowledge hub, where I share insights on AI-powered workflows, Python automation, React/Next.js development, and geospatial innovation. My goal is to simplify complexity and provide actionable, AI-enhanced digital solutions for developers and businesses alike.

hero.title: Explore, Learn, Build.
hero.subtitle: Delve into blog posts, How-Tos, and project showcases on automation, development, and geospatial solutions.

intro.p1: This space is where ideas meet practicality! It has been thought as a collection of articles, tutorials, and insights aimed at making technical concepts accessible to everyone, regardless of skill level. My goal is to keep things light yet meaningful, blending technical depth with clarity and a touch of creativity.
intro.p2: I am not here to reinvent the wheel or repeat what is already out there. Instead, I strive to demystify topics, sharing solutions and approaches rooted in real-world challenges. Whether you are exploring Python, geospatial intelligence/GIS, diving into AI, or automating processes, the content here is designed to inform, inspire, and occasionally make you smile.
intro.p3: Because learning should be as enjoyable as it is empowering.

bookshelf.title: On my Bookshelf
bookshelf.intro: Books have always been my go-to source of inspiration, an inexhaustible source of knowledge, and a magical door into my imagination. In this section, I am sharing the books that have shaped my understanding of programming, problem-solving, and more. Each entry includes my takeaways, giving you a glimpse into the insights that keep me growing. Whether you are a fellow bookworm or just looking for your next read, I hope you will find these recommendations as enlightening as I have.

item1.label: Founder & Full-Stack Engineer
item1.summary: Founder and visionary behind Jerenyon Dev, delivering custom web development, automation, and AI-driven solutions.

description.p1: Founded Jerenyon Dev to provide tailored automation tools, web development services, and innovative geospatial solutions.
description.p2: Built scalable, full-stack applications using Python, Django, React, and Next.js and Typescript, with a focus on operational optimization and digital transformation.
description.p3: Leveraged advanced tools and libraries such as LangChain, OpenAI, Hugging Face models, and Vercel AI SDK to integrate cutting-edge AI capabilities, including generative AI systems and intelligent automation workflows.
description.p4: Designed cloud-native infrastructure with seamless deployments, leveraging Docker, Vercel, and advanced integrations such as Resend for modern communication.
description.p5: Created Jerenyon Dev as a platform for showcasing technical expertise, sharing methodologies, and driving engagement through portfolio projects and blog posts.

item2.label: TensorFlow Developer Specialization
item2.summary: Completed TensorFlow Developer Professional Certificate, mastering neural network training, image recognition with convolutions, and NLP. Gained practical skills in building AI solutions using TensorFlow.

item3.label: Deep Learning Specialization
item3.summary: Completed Deep Learning Specialization, mastering neural networks, including CNNs, RNNs, LSTMs, and Transformers. Gained expertise in applying these models to real-world tasks like NLP, speech recognition, and more using Python and TensorFlow.

item4.label: Machine Learning Specialization
item4.summary: Completed Machine Learning Specialization, mastering key techniques like supervised and unsupervised learning, recommender systems, and reinforcement learning. Gained practical skills to apply these methods to real-world challenges.

item5.label: Full-Stack Automation Engineer & Continuous Improvement Advisor
item5.summary: Driving innovation and operational efficiency through Python automation and LLMs, RAG workflows, GIS-driven solutions, and full-stack development for scalable AI applications.

description.p1: Developed and deployed AI-powered tools, including RAG chatbot and AI agents with LangChain, achieving a 50% reduction in manual query resolution times.
description.p2: Designed and deployed a cloud-based automation platform, integrating Dockerized Django backends and Next.js frontends, streamlining processes, and enabling AI capabilities.
description.p3: Developed Python-powered SaaS tools and automation frameworks, and geospatial data pipelines, cutting manual efforts by over 60% and improving geospatial data processing efficiency.
description.p4: Led AI/ML R&D initiatives, integrating LLMs, LangChain, and Hugging Face into real-world applications to enhance automation and geospatial analysis.
description.p5: Strategically implemented GIS technologies, for digital transformation, automating workflows into data-driven solutions, reducing project timelines by up to 80% and improving network design accuracy.
description.p6: Built and mentored an agile development team, fostering autonomy, best practices in AI, Python, GIS, and modern software methodologies.
description.p7: Managed Azure cloud infrastructure, overseeing web apps, databases, container registries, networking, and CI/CD pipelines for seamless deployment.

item6.label: Co-Founder & Full-Stack Engineer
item6.summary: Co-founder leading technical strategy and full-stack development for our creative e-commerce platform.

description.p1: Transitioned NJAE Plume from WordPress to a scalable custom e-commerce platform built with Django, ensuring a seamless and user-friendly experience.
description.p2: Implemented full-stack solutions using Python, React, and Postgres, with a focus on future-ready API integration for mobile applications.
description.p3: Led backend and database design for streamlined operations, while ensuring high performance and scalability of the platform.
description.p4: Managed business operations, aligning technical innovation with strategic growth objectives to drive success and foster creativity.

item7.label: Fiber Network Designer | GIS Automation Engineer
item7.summary: Enhanced fiber network design workflows through Python automation and GIS technology, leading to the development of a powerful Django-based platform.

description.p1: Transformed manual CAD workflows by integrating GIS tools and Python automation, optimizing network design and reducing human error.
description.p2: Developed a Django platform for project management and reporting, streamlining operations and accelerating project delivery.
description.p3: Built Postgres/PostGIS databases for advanced geospatial data management, enabling automated processes and robust analytics for fiber network planning.
description.p4: Created Python-based SaaS tools with user-friendly GUIs for non-technical staff, improving accessibility and operational efficiency.
description.p5: Enhanced engineering workflows with custom AutoLISP tools, improving productivity in AutoCAD and AutoCAD Map 3D environments.
description.p6: Pioneered GIS pilot projects, laying the foundation for data-driven decision-making and automation within the organization.
description.p7: Collaborated effectively with multidisciplinary teams, facilitating knowledge transfer, mentoring, and fostering a culture of technological adoption and continuous improvement.

item8.label: Master of Science in Geography (MSc)
item8.summary: Advanced expertise in physical geography, GIS intelligence, and spatial analysis with a focus on hydrogeomorphology, climatology, and coastal risk management in littoral environments.

description.p1: Specialized in the scientific study and management of environmental resources, with a focus on physical geography, hydrogeomorphology, and natural risk assessment, particularly in littoral regions.
description.p2: Acquired advanced expertise in GIS and geomatics, including spatial data processing, cartographic modeling, and integrated analysis of environmental systems.
description.p3: Deepened knowledge in hydrology, climatology, meteorology, and geomorphology, applying multidisciplinary approaches to study coastal processes and storm-induced risks.
description.p4: Gained foundational insights into geology, enhancing the understanding of terrain dynamics, while engaging in fieldwork and laboratory analysis to assess natural and anthropogenic impacts.
description.p5: Completed a 6-month research internship, producing a thesis that combined field studies, theoretical analysis, and GIS-based modeling to address real-world challenges, culminating in a formal oral defense.

item9.label: Bachelor's Degree in Geography
item9.summary: Comprehensive education in physical geography, GIS, and spatial analysis, with a focus on systemic approaches to natural phenomena and littoral studies.

description.p1: Developed a strong foundation in geography, transitioning from introductory concepts to advanced expertise in physical geography and environmental studies.
description.p2: Specialized in GIS and spatial analysis, gaining proficiency in mapping, data visualization, and geospatial intelligence for understanding complex environmental systems.
description.p3: Studied a range of physical geography fields, including hydrology, geology, oceanology, hydrogeomorphology, and climatology, with a focus on littoral processes and natural risks.
description.p4: Embraced a systemic approach to the scientific study of environmental phenomena, considering interconnected dynamics and their implications on broader systems.
description.p5: Gained practical experience through fieldwork and analytical projects, exploring the interactions of natural processes and their impact on human and environmental systems.

item10.label: Microsoft Copilot for Software Development
item10.summary: Completed Microsoft Copilot for Software Development Specialization, mastering AI-driven coding, code reviews, documentation, and project planning with GitHub Copilot.

item11.label: Vector Database Fundamentals
item11.summary: Completed IBM Vector Database Fundamentals Specialization, gaining hands-on experience in vector search, embeddings, ChromaDB, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and AI-powered recommendation systems.

item12.label: IBM Generative AI Engineering
item12.summary: Completed IBM Generative AI Engineering Professional Certificate, gaining hands-on expertise in LLM architectures, fine-tuning, RAG workflows, AI agents, and deploying generative AI applications.
